job_description:
Our client in Downtown Toronto is looking for a Senior Developer for a 6 month contract.

Role:

As a Senior Developer, you will design and implement technologies to deliver relevant and reliable information efficiently across the firm. You will have hands-on, end-to-end delivery experience in designing, developing, and deploying applications and portals, data feeds, and databases. You have solid application development and data warehouse experience.
You are self-motivated, dedicated, and passionate about solving problems and driving continual improvement and innovation.

Work Type:

CONTRACT - 6 Months
Hybrid 3 days a week in the office
Mon to Wed in office, Thurs and Fri remote
Location: Downtown Toronto

Company Culture:

You will work for a company that has strong values and is committed to building enduring working relationships and ensuring all interactions with investors, partners, and our employees/team members are characterized by trust, openness, respect, and the highest standards of integrity and professionalism, as articulated in their Mission Statement. Their approach is professional, trust-based, non-hierarchical, collegial, and committed to fact-based decision-making.

Key Responsibilities:

Build, design, and develop internal-based web solution(s)
Work with large volumes of data with regular refresh frequency, and ensure quality by building testing & exception measures into the data lifecycle.
Work between departments to define business requirements for validating data
Work within Azure services required to deliver the best outcomes for businesses.
Develop and integrate multiple internal & external systems.
Build and maintain new applications, databases, and third-party integrations.
Establish and implement measures to ensure data accuracy and accessibility.
Deploy best practice planning and governance with respect to documenting, versioning & security for underlying project(s).

Skills:

5 years developing & operating large-scale enterprise systems & databases.
7 years of programming experience with Visual Studio, and .Net framework using C#, ASP.NET, SQL, CSS3, and HTML.
Experience with one or more of the following web-based frameworks Blazor or ASP.NET MVC.
Cloud solution implementation expertise within Azure hosting and Azure functions.
Detailed MS SQL Server + Azure data experience in configuration, maintaining, writing, and optimizing complex SQL queries
Understanding of modern RDBMS concepts.
Experience in building & consuming web APIs Rest and/or SOAP.
Understanding of backend data processing/file delivery (SFTP, API, ETL, Scheduling, Error handling
Experience working with large datasets and building a web-based solution to add insight to this data and measuring the quality of the data.

Education:

Degree in Computer Science, Applied Math, Engineering or related field
Experience with public or private market investments or the financial services industry.

Rate:

$75-80/hour

#LI-Hybrid
